resources.string: It is one of the most representative hotels for its architecture and comfort, has a privileged location facing the boardwalk of Guatapé and thematic suites with beautiful views of the dam.\nReservations:(57)(4)8610016 - 312 783 4050
Beautiful hotel located 9 km from the town of Guatapé, has comfortable spaces, exit to the dam and restaurant\nTelephone:(57)(4)8610053.\nCelphone: 320 6532410 - 313 7931806
Privileged location 300 mtrs of Guatape, beautiful view of the dam and the Peñol stone, in a very quiet area.\nReservations:(57)(4)861 1374

Guatape Tourism: the tourist information about the municipality of Guatapé, Antioquia
Version 1.0
Developed by Laura Velasquez Cano for mobile applications course
Contact:. Lalavelas31@hotmail.com

Total population:5.623 hab. (2009)
Urban population:4.182
Rural population: 1.441
Literacy:92.3%% (2005)
Urban area:93.8%%
Rural area:87.8%%

Ethnography:
According to figures provided by DANE 2005 census, the Ethnographic composition of the municipality is:
Mestizos and whites (99.96 %%)
Afro (0.04 %%)
El Zócalo (Delicias and Bar) is a place that offers a variety of meals, drinks and spirits in a friendly environment and based on the Guatapes roots\n.Contact: 320 6651278
La Playita is the place to enjoy the scenery of Guatape, an excellent bar and grill in the day and at night\nContact: 321 7464300
Typical food restaurant where you will find the different foods that characterize our country.\nContact: 320 7890079
It is located at 4 kmts of Guatape, Peñol via , 200 meters high monolith where a 360 degree view on the Guatapé dam is obtained.\nAscent (optional): $10,000 COP
Located one block from the main square, 1 kmt extension where you can enjoy the most varied cuisine in 25 restaurants found there, with a privileged view over the Guatape dam.

Imagine yourself in the middle of a forest and in the background a stunning dam. Take a deep breath, close your eyes and let your senses are activated.








To make this experience real, we invite you to visit the park Comfama Guatapé.










Accept the Aguaventura challenge, make an ecological tour with a wonderful view and then share with your family outdoors a delicious barbecue and live a day full of tranquility.
